Package org.eclipse.team.ui

Interface IConfigurationWizard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IWizard
    public interface IConfigurationWizard
extends IWizard
    IConfigurationWizard defines the interface that users of the extension point org.eclipse.team.ui.configurationWizards must implement.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void init​(IWorkbench workbench, IProject project)
      Initializes this creation wizard using the passed workbench and the selected project.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.jface.wizard.IWizard

        addPages, canFinish, createPageControls, dispose, getContainer, getDefaultPageImage, getDialogSettings, getNextPage, getPage, getPageCount, getPages, getPreviousPage, getStartingPage, getTitleBarColor, getWindowTitle, isHelpAvailable, needsPreviousAndNextButtons, needsProgressMonitor, performCancel, performFinish, setContainer

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init​(IWorkbench workbench,
          IProject project)
        Initializes this creation wizard using the passed workbench and the selected project.

        This method is called after the no argument constructor and before other methods are called.

        Parameters:
        workbench - the current workbench
        project - the selected project
